column4: hey guys what's the one thing, hardlink? to make my stuff faster cuase ubuntu is FRICKIN SLOW

forget gnome and install xfce4

rofl
gnome is too slow on your computer, and you're going to run KDE?
ubuntu is slow period, it's always been the same. I have a +2500 AMD Barton, 512MB DDR, 40 GBs, and an ATI 9800 Pro, might not be the latest but even windows runs faster
something's got to be wrong there
at first I thought it was a vid card problem but it isn't, cuase my 3d programs run fine
please help me cuase I've been trying to fix this forever!
i've been running xfce4 and my 2.4ghz fast as lightning with 512mb DDR on a 80 gig drive it shares half of with XP
exactly, and does GNOME or KDE run fine on your pc?

yeah but I thought that gnome or kde should run fine on such a pc
do you have any swap set up?
